name: Don't Disturb My Circle!
description:
Don't Disturb My Circle! is a bullet hell game in which you play as a cranky old wizard who wishes to be left alone to research his spells. His studies attract nearby monsters that have sensed the magical powers of his arcane activity, but since his spellcasting requires standing inside his magical formation, he must defend himself while being confined to a small area.

Defeat the oncoming hordes amidst a flurry of deadly projectiles to upgrade both the wizard's and his circle's capabilities, or die trying!

CAUTION: some visual effects are mildly flashy, and generally there are lots of bright moving objects on the screen at  any given time while playing.

Things that I used that are not mine

  • BulletFury (demo version)
  • Silver font
  • Retro Gaming font
  • music and SFX done by my friend Andy

Submission for the Bullet Hell Jam  2022

Things for the future

  • controller support
  • accessibility features ie colorblind mode
  • options for resolution, sound, etc
  • additional enemies, levels, areas, and bosses
  • different weapons, special abilities, upgrades and purchases
  • leaderboard
  • playtesting and numbers tuning
